title: Production of commercial gramophonic discs
creator_contributor_role: South Australian Film Corporation, production company
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Sound - Recording and reproducing

description: A look at the various processes involved in the making of a record - from the artists recording onto multi-track tapes, through to the marketing and distribution to the public. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
